meanings.definition: A type of moth belonging to the family Pyralidae.
meanings.sent1: The pyralidid fluttered gracefully in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: I saw a pyralidid resting on a flower in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The pyralidid decided to take a nap on a cozy leaf.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as delicate as the wings of a pyralidid.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful patterns on the pyralidid's wings.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to moths of the family Pyralidae.
meanings.sent1: The pyralidid caterpillar slowly crawled along the branch.
meanings.sent2: She studied the pyralidid species found in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The pyralidid party was full of fluttering guests.
meanings.sent4: His room was decorated with pyralidid-themed curtains.
meanings.sent5: The pyralidid exhibit showcased various moth species.
